comments:
Problem 1:
C/C++ indexer continuously trys to index the project file system everytime I try
to save any cpp file. 

Also the C++ indexer on completion of indexing, pops a error message with reason
being blank "reason :                                 ".
 
While indexing is in progress, the UI response is very bad !

I have attached the few important portions from .log file for your reference below.

Problem 2:
Another problem is that the Eclipse workbench, randomly popups an Internal error
   window, that reads as shown below, 

   "An out of memory error has occurred. You can prevent these errors in the
future by increasing your heap size before you start the workbench using -vmargs
-Xmx command line option.
     You are recommended to exit the workbench
      Subsequent errors may happen and may terminate the workbench without     
    warning. "

  
------------------- .log file --------------------

!ENTRY org.eclipse.cdt.core 4 4 Jul 20, 2004 10:20:19.659
!MESSAGE Error
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexerModelListener.processDelta(IndexerModelListener.java:66)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexerModelListener.processDelta(IndexerModelListener.java:97)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexerModelListener.elementChanged(IndexerModelListener.java:48)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:628)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.cdt.core 4 4 Jul 20, 2004 10:40:38.640
!MESSAGE Background Indexer Crash Recovery
!STACK 0
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError

How much memory are you running with? How large is the project you are trying 
to index?

Can you give us more info on the configuration?

Eclipse version? CDT version?  Is it on RedHat or SLES? JVM?

Thanks.

Version of Linux OS: Fedora Core 2 
RAM :  256 MB DDR RAM,  
Processor: Pentium 4 
Kernel version :  2.6.6-1.435.2.3
Eclipse :  Version: 3.0.0, Build id: 200406251208
CDT version : 2.0.0   (updated today from
http://update.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/releases/new )
